about_the_game:
"RYSTEL" is a 2D action-adventure game with a journey to seek the truth of the star crystal called "RYSTEL".

—One day, an ominous shadow fell over the world colored by the crystal.
The boy and the girl set off on a journey to recollect his lost memories.
Then they eventually reach the truth of the world that was once beautiful—

This is the story of the crystal "RYSTEL" and people who live with its power.
Enjoy a nostalgic adventure with soft pixel art.


  • A 2D action of easy control; attacks, jumps and dashes.
  • As the story progresses, players get four different modes, which can switch at any time.
    Use a variety of abilities, from simple attack actions to warp actions allow you to fly freely.
  • Explore the world and expand your horizons.
    Collect skill-cards scattered around the world, use more than 30 types of powerful special skills.
  • Enjoy fascinating landscapes and various encounters with attractive characters in this mysterious world.
